des: "Apples, thyme, and Dijon mustard are classic flavors to pair with pork chops. Now those ingredients are prepared in a cocktail, but instead of pork, they are combined with bourbon. This is a flavor combination you've gotta try!"
ins: Place 2 sprigs fresh thyme in a cocktail shaker. Add bourbon, Dijon mustard, apple cider, lemon juice, and simple syrup. Fill with ice, cover and shake until chilled. Strain into a large mug or mason jar filled with ice. Garnish with a sprig of fresh thyme.
